title: 43: OBITCH send in the clowns...
description:
Obitch this episode is jam-packed! We’ve got a blast from the past with funeral clowns + some new info on clown funerals! And then we’re getting into everything you need to know about an at-home burial. We’ve got a wild range of obituaries and of course, some dumb.ass.criminallllls! 
Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807
Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast
Sponsors: 
Apostrophe: Go to apostrophe.com/obit and click begin visit then use our code OBIT at sign up and you’ll get your first visit for only $5!!
Better Help: Visit betterhelp.com/obit to get 10% off your first month!
Raycon: Obitchuary listeners can get 15% off their raycon order at buyraycon.com/obit ! 

Sources:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nGLvRt8nMEA https://people.howstuffworks.com/culture-traditions/funerals/can-you-bury-someone-your-backyard.htm https://www.familytree.com/blog/things-to-know-if-your-home-has-a-cemetery-on-the-property/ https://twitter.com/theeagle/status/955885350806749186?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E955885350806749186%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fpeople.com%2Fpets%2Ffamous-pet-chicken-big-mama-obituary%2F https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/18009425/church-graveyard-home-spooky-secret/ https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/weird-news/unique-home-magnificent-history-up-26556329 https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/coshoctontribune/name/dick-meek-obituary?id=7743182 https://nypost.com/2022/03/15/dangerous-driver-of-wild-car-chase-whips-out-legoland-license/ https://www.abcactionnews.com/news/state/police-florida-man-hid-legless-fugitive-girlfriend-in-plastic-tote https://www.legacy.com/news/celebrity-deaths/dagny-carlsson-1912-2022-worlds-oldest-blogger/ https://www.abcactionnews.com/news/state/police-florida-man-hid-legless-fugitive-girlfriend-in-plastic-tote https://www.legacy.com/news/celebrity-deaths/dagny-carlsson-1912-2022-worlds-oldest-blogger/ https://www.thestar.com.my/lifestyle/people/2021/04/14/germany039s-only-funeral-clown-just-wants-people-to-rethink-death https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/its-okay-to-giggle-at-the-clown-funeral
